title: WIFI CRASHED
body: I was playing a ranked game when my wifi crashed, so when I make it on agai, I reconnect to the game and finish the game . After that i received a 10 min lower queue. If i was not reconnecting i would agree but i thought its a little bit huge .

replies.body: An account can receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) queue for leaving either entirely or for a duration.  Even if you return to the game, you're still gone for some time when everyone else is down a player and that causes a negative experience for them.   If you're having any connection issues specifically let me know, and I'd be happy to help!
